What a great story!!

messages.subject: being there doing that
messages.msgSnippet: As I reread my response to Deborah s question I was reminded of Ginny s typical unschooling day, which is here:http://sandradodd.com/unschool/ginnyday.html.
messages.messageBody:
As I reread my response to Deborah's question I was reminded of Ginny's typical unschooling day, which is here:http://sandradodd.com/unschool/ginnyday.html. Maybe, if you read through the typical days things at http://sandradodd.com/typical you can see more what kind of outcomes changing your perspective from schooling to unschooling might bring.

Schuyler

www.waynforth.blogspot.com

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
